请按实际上传图片灵活调整数值，以达到抠出头发蒙版的目的。❗❗❗❗❗❗❗

Please flexibly adjust the value according to the actual uploaded picture to achieve the purpose of hiding the mask❗❗❗❗❗

1、输入发型提示词更换发型。
2、需灵活调整区域分割部分的数值，每张图不同，按实际情况调整。
3、适合简单的背景。
4、适合正面角度的模特图或头发区域比较明显的，特殊角度可能无法正常出图。
5、适合女性，男性效果一般。
6、报错时可将报错模块Ctrl+b绕过。
7、每一部分有相应的使用说明。

1. Enter hairstyles prompt words to change hairstyles.
2, need to flexibly adjust the value of the region segmentation part, each map is different, adjust according to the actual situation.
3, suitable for simple backgrounds.
4, suitable for the positive Angle of the model picture or hair area is more obvious, special Angle may not be able to draw normally.
5, suitable for women, male effect is general.
6. You can bypass the error module Ctrl+b when you report an error.
7. Each part has corresponding instructions for use.
